title: Pregnant Lucy Mecklenburgh joins fiancé Ryan Thomas at bar launch
text:
On Sunday, they revealed they are expecting a baby boy.

And Lucy Mecklenburgh and her beloved fiancé Ryan Thomas certainly look excited for their imminent arrival as they headed to the launch of The Spin bar in Manchester on Thursday evening while displaying her blooming bump.

The former TOWIE star, 28, looked sensational in her camel ensemble as she beamed alongside Ryan, 35, who went casual in a denim jacket.

My guy: Lucy Mecklenburgh and her beloved fiancé Ryan Thomas certainly look excited by their imminent arrival as they headed to the launch of The Spin bar in Manchester on Thursday

Lucy looked sensational in the ensemble as she wowed in the tight jumper which perfectly cradled her bump yet maintained an elegant look.

She draped a jacket over her shoulders while also boosting her height with a pair of chic Yves Saint Laurent heels with strappy details and the YSL logo on the front.

The brunette beauty wore her chocolate locks in a loosely-curled bob while she was boasting the fabled new mother glow for the outing.

On Sunday, Lucy shared a sweet video of the moment she and Ryan discovered the sex of the baby as she looked overjoyed at the news.

Check me out: The former TOWIE star, 28, looked sensational in her camel ensemble as she beamed alongside Ryan, 35, who went casual in a denim jacket

Ryan, meanwhile, made the announcement with a photo of himself and Lucy, clad in blue swimwear, cradling her bump. He wrote: 'Blue is for.....?'

In the video Lucy shared on Instagram, Ryan was reduced to tears when he discovered they were having a baby boy.

Lucy, who clutched the papers revealing their baby's sex in her hands, brought her hand to her mouth in shock when she gazed down at the paper.

Bumping along nicely: She looked stunning in the ensemble which was oozing elegance

Overwhelmed with joy, Ryan punched his hands in the air, hugged Lucy and gave her a kiss on the cheek.

Within minutes of revealing the gender, a slew of their celebrity pals rushed to congratulate them. Samia Longchambon wrote: 'Aww a little boy! Congrats guys.'

Dean Gaffney joked: 'As much as we take the p**s out of each other, your photo skills are on point...' Ashley James commented with a slew of love heart emojis.

Lucy took to Instagram on the evening of her 28th birthday to announce she is expecting her first child with Ryan and debuted her blossoming baby bump in a figure-hugging red dress.

Over the moon: Ryan, meanwhile, made the announcement with a photo of himself and Lucy, clad in blue swimwear, cradling her bump. He wrote: 'Blue is for.....?'

The ex Corrie star gifted Lucy a baby grow, which they held up for the snap as they revealed that they are set to welcome their first baby together, two months after he proposed during a romantic trip to Italy, following two years of dating.

Alongside the heartwarming shot, the reality star wrote: Best birthday present 'I've ever had. Love you @ryanthomas84,' with a baby emoji and a heart emoji included in the caption.

Ryan also raises daughter Scarlett with his ex-girlfriend and former Coronation Street co-star Tina O'Brien, 35, who he was in a relationship with for six years.
